004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PS4Controller;
008
009/** Class to control a simulated PS4 controller. */
010public class PS4ControllerSim extends GenericHIDSim {
011  /**
012   * Constructs from a PS4Controller object.
013   *
014   * @param joystick controller to simulate
015   */
016  public PS4ControllerSim(PS4Controller joystick) {
017    super(joystick);
018    setAxisCount(6);
019    setButtonCount(14);
020    setPOVCount(1);
021  }
022
023  /**
024   * Constructs from a joystick port number.
025   *
026   * @param port port number
027   */
028  public PS4ControllerSim(int port) {
029    super(port);
030    setAxisCount(6);
031    setButtonCount(14);
032  }
033
034  /**
035   * Change the X axis value of the controller's left stick.
036   *
037   * @param value the new value
038   */
039  public void setLeftX(double value) {
040    setRawAxis(PS4Controller.Axis.kLeftX.value, value);
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Change the X axis value of the controller's right stick.
045   *
046   * @param value the new value
047   */
048  public void setRightX(double value) {
049    setRawAxis(PS4Controller.Axis.kRightX.value, value);
050  }
051
052  /**
053   * Change the Y axis value of the controller's left stick.
054   *
055   * @param value the new value
056   */
057  public void setLeftY(double value) {
058    setRawAxis(PS4Controller.Axis.kLeftY.value, value);
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Change the Y axis value of the controller's right stick.
063   *
064   * @param value the new value
065   */
066  public void setRightY(double value) {
067    setRawAxis(PS4Controller.Axis.kRightY.value, value);
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Change the L2 axis axis value of the controller.
072   *
073   * @param value the new value
074   */
075  public void setL2Axis(double value) {
076    setRawAxis(PS4Controller.Axis.kL2.value, value);
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Change the R2 axis value of the controller.
081   *
082   * @param value the new value
083   */
084  public void setR2Axis(double value) {
085    setRawAxis(PS4Controller.Axis.kR2.value, value);
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Change the value of the Square button on the controller.
090   *
091   * @param value the new value
092   */
093  public void setSquareButton(boolean value) {
094    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kSquare.value, value);
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Change the value of the Cross button on the controller.
099   *
100   * @param value the new value
101   */
102  public void setCrossButton(boolean value) {
103    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kCross.value, value);
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * Change the value of the Circle button on the controller.
108   *
109   * @param value the new value
110   */
111  public void setCircleButton(boolean value) {
112    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kCircle.value, value);
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Change the value of the Triangle button on the controller.
117   *
118   * @param value the new value
119   */
120  public void setTriangleButton(boolean value) {
121    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kTriangle.value, value);
122  }
123
124  /**
125   * Change the value of the L1 button on the controller.
126   *
127   * @param value the new value
128   */
129  public void setL1Button(boolean value) {
130    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kL1.value, value);
131  }
132
133  /**
134   * Change the value of the R1 button on the controller.
135   *
136   * @param value the new value
137   */
138  public void setR1Button(boolean value) {
139    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kR1.value, value);
140  }
141
142  /**
143   * Change the value of the L2 button on the controller.
144   *
145   * @param value the new value
146   */
147  public void setL2Button(boolean value) {
148    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kL2.value, value);
149  }
150
151  /**
152   * Change the value of the R2 button on the controller.
153   *
154   * @param value the new value
155   */
156  public void setR2Button(boolean value) {
157    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kR2.value, value);
158  }
159
160  /**
161   * Change the value of the Share button on the controller.
162   *
163   * @param value the new value
164   */
165  public void setShareButton(boolean value) {
166    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kShare.value, value);
167  }
168
169  /**
170   * Change the value of the Options button on the controller.
171   *
172   * @param value the new value
173   */
174  public void setOptionsButton(boolean value) {
175    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kOptions.value, value);
176  }
177
178  /**
179   * Change the value of the L3 (left stick) button on the controller.
180   *
181   * @param value the new value
182   */
183  public void setL3Button(boolean value) {
184    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kL3.value, value);
185  }
186
187  /**
188   * Change the value of the R3 (right stick) button on the controller.
189   *
190   * @param value the new value
191   */
192  public void setR3Button(boolean value) {
193    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kR3.value, value);
194  }
195
196  /**
197   * Change the value of the PS button on the controller.
198   *
199   * @param value the new value
200   */
201  public void setPSButton(boolean value) {
202    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kPS.value, value);
203  }
204
205  /**
206   * Change the value of the touchpad button on the controller.
207   *
208   * @param value the new value
209   */
210  public void setTouchpad(boolean value) {
211    setRawButton(PS4Controller.Button.kTouchpad.value, value);
212  }
213}
